isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000, 9100, 9200, 9400, AND 9900 MODELS - POWER DISTRIBUTION AND GROUND SYSTEM - OPERATION - ACCESSORY POWER

svcproc.title: ACCESSORY POWER
svcproc.para: Battery power from the (B1) battery stud is applied to the common terminal (30) of the accessory relay (149) and to the key switch "B" terminal. Refer to 12V POWER DISTRIBUTION - ACCESSORY circuit diagram in CTS-5119W or CTS-5273W. With the key switch in the ACC position (or IGN position), power from the key switch "A" terminal:

item.para: Energizes the accessory adapter relay (149), applying power to A3 accessory adapter (501).
Flows to A1 Accessory Adapter (499) and to the Electric Wiper Intermittent Relay.
